questionTitle: Is there a bank where I can ________ these pounds for dollars?
The chief of police said that he saw no ________ between the six murders.
Smoking is a very bad habit, which many people find difficult to ________.
Would you ________ passing this book to Sue, please?
There's ________ to be frightened of the dog; he's quite harmless.
Her father won't ________ her drive his car.
The competitors in the car rally had to follow the ________ laid down by the organisers.
If only I ________ play the guitar as well as you!
It is a great ________ that the exhibition was cancelled at the last minute after all your work.
On our ________ to France, the car broke down twice.
He has adopted three orphans ________ his own six children so that, altogether, he has nine children to provide for.
I cannot understand how you put ________ these depressing surroundings.
I regret to say that you will have to take things ________.
We ________ to go to the concert, but we ran out of time and so, we didn't go.
No one ________ he was.
This house is cheap, but that one is ________.
If the line is busy, don't wait and ________.
If they ________ to that party, they would certainly have decided to attend it.
If I saw Mark, I ________ him to a party.
I was very ________ not to pass of the message about the holiday being cancelled.
